about_the_game:
Got an idea in your head about an action game that puts emphasis on exploration?
The “Tridome: Explorative-Platformer” sample project is here to help! This base sample is a 5-mins, short game with a Sci-Fi “Metroidvania” feel. The sample itself may be short, but consists of important fundamental elements such as:
・A hero character armed with a shooting weapon, and weapon switch capability.
・Trash enemies and boss battle.

・Map transition gimmick such as doors and elevators.

・Jump platforms and switches.

・Events such as addition of new weapons through item pickups and ending events.
・Mini-maps
With this template, you can create your own original explorative-action game through tweaking parameters and changing the assets according to your needs!

【STORY】
A primitive world - ≪Planet MV296≫ has been discovered recently - but a group of unknown lifeform and advanced technologies are spotted lurking in its orbit.
You play the role of the Armed Investigator: Mee Karasabi. You must commence a solo operation to gather more information about this enigmatic entity.

【Controls】
←→ Movement
↑↓ Elevator
Z-Key (Aボタン) Jump
X-Key (Xボタン) Shoot
A-Key (Yボタン) Switch Weapons
Space Bar (Bボタン) Toggle Mini-map

【How to Use】
Once downloaded the sample game will be available under the “sample” tab. If it is not there, please try re-installing the DLC.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 2.0GHz or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 3.0GHz or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
